tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IOCs (
  ioc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ioc_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ioc_value TEXT NOT NULL,
  detected_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IOCs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator TEXT NOT NULL,
    type TEXT NOT NULL,
    details TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Threats (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    severity TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    ioc_id UUID REFERENCES IOCs(id)
);

CREATE TABLE IOCs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
  indicator_value TEXT UNIQUE,
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Threats (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_type VARCHAR(50),
  threat_description TEXT,
  severity INTEGER,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  incident_description TEXT,
  incident_date DATE,
  is_resolved BOOLEAN,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE indicators_of_compromise (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ioc_type VARCHAR(50),
    ioc_value TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE threats (
    threat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ioc_id UUID REFERENCES indicators_of_compromise(id),
    threat_name VARCHAR(100),
    detection_date TIMESTAMP,
    threat_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE affected_systems (
    system_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id UUID REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
    system_name VARCHAR(100),
    affected_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id UUID REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE indicators_of_compromise (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hash TEXT,
    type TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE threat_actors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    country TEXT,
    group TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE compromised_systems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ip_address TEXT,
    hostname TEXT,
    operating_system TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    severity TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE actions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_type TEXT,
    action_description TEXT,
    executed_by TEXT
)
